title: Differentiate no notes from API error
description: Currently both 'no notes' and 'API error' show empty. Should distinguish between the two states.

title: Appointment adherence metric
description: Show % acknowledged vs unacknowledged appointments. Track locator responsiveness.

title: Consolidate terminal stages list
description: Terminal stages are defined in 3 places. Should be single source of truth.

title: Loading feedback for prefetch
description: Batch operations (stage history, notes) don't show progress. Add visual feedback during prefetch.

title: Refactor duplicate HTML table rendering
description: At-risk and needs-attention lists share nearly identical table rendering code. Extract to shared helper.

title: Consolidate platform date formatting
description: Windows vs Unix date format checks are repeated in multiple places. Extract to helper function.

title: Cycle time metric
description: Track days from appointment to close. Help identify bottlenecks in the sales process.

title: Locator performance trends
description: Compare locators over time. Show which locators are performing well vs struggling.
